level.text: Nothing contained in this chapter shall limit or alter the Commission’s authority under D.C. Official Code ยง 34-912(a) (2010 Repl. & 2011 Supp.) to require reimbursement of the expenses, including the expenses of the Office of the People’s Counsel, of any investigation, valuation, revaluation, or other proceeding by the Commission concerning a particular public utility.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 29 DCR 3245, 3248 (July 30, 1982); as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 59 DCR 4230, 4232 (May 4, 2012).
